bow: does anyone else feel like friendships got more difficult after havung kids feel like lacking good friendships in my life it seems to have started ever since had kids my closest friends from way back before we were all married don have kids out of all of my couple friends those with kids the only one who had to change my work schedule to accommodate childcare so our availability it always complicated even mom groups dance classes schools play ground dates struggle making new friendships ve always been friendly and nice but it hard to make mom friends and feel insecure about the friend ships do have has any one else found this to be struggle since they have had children yes my friendships definitely changed and it hard to make friends as adults as well am fortunate to have great group that meets up at least every month are you able to schedule like night once month to meet up with friends it important for your state of mind as well maybe check into mom groups around your area also have been able to meet some nice mom in my daughter music class it takes time and lot more effort with regards to scheduling ve started nothing parties ll post on social media that ll be sitting on my lawn for example wednesday from and anyone can come through and do nothing with me it been pretty successful but have to give couple days notice they can bring kids or husbands or whoever just available too tired to take dance class or go rock climbing or learn to cross stitch just want margarita yep sure did only have few close friends now and most of my best friends disappeared after baby that was years ago you and would get along that sounds amazing it sunset season right now after work it good time yes long for the days college specifically when making friends was easy feel like haven had that deep comfortable friendship connection in so long like when you could just hang out and do nothing with someone and be so comfortable to say or do anything with them feel like making friends or heck even acquaintances —has become strategic operation even other moms felt connection with it just doesn blossom into true friendship had mom come up to me with time and activity one day we had been friendly and talked generics about doing something but really wishy washy couldn say no it was great we were friends for while drifted apart but that was after our kids started preschool yes yes yes what more feel like have lot of friends kind of most of them are friends of one specific friend that ve had since was 12 but when we re all in the same place they always make me feel involved but can call any one of them at random to hang out no probably not would they care if moved to another state doubt it beyond that friend group have one friend that talk to every single day we ve been friends since kindergarten and love each other dearly but she lives in north carolina and still in our home state of indiana guess our kids are our new friendships yes it is hard it hard to have friends if they do have kids they have to understand that have little time and my kids will sometimes be around and taking my time if they have kids not only do need to like them and their kids but my kids have to like them and their kids have so little energy and time feel like do put the effort in that is needed to develop new friendship with someone there is one mom at my son school who seems cool and wants to have playdates but the truth is that my son is way too rambunctious for her daughter do see it working out it sad and lonely have no one constantly home with just my 10 month old while my husband works 6a 6:30p and then we spend few hours together till he has to sleep for work currently 12 weeks pregnant too so when my friends do call it to go party and drink and can do have to turn down any form of going out with them cause we are keeping it secret and can just say hey pregnant so can drink and party wan na do something else did you read the turquoise table that sounds very similar to what the author did for the record found the book very repetitious but liked the idea behind it this is great idea ve tried to do something similar and it stuck with one person then they moved away to be closer to their family totally relate to this ve made friends but it does always feel little strange and they never seem to get beyond the kids we have in common anyone in salt lake city that doesn mind super cool tattooed lady with 16 month old and dog on the market for mom friends feel you have close friends with kids that live 2+ hours away have friends who live close but they are more like people know certainly couldn say we aren friends but couldn just call them to chat or get together to just hang out it so hard when you re not on consistent schedule honestly if you can swing it have someone watch your kid and do volleyball or something once week when your kid is older and has solid friend then work out play dates and maybe you ll be compatible with the kids parents have few good mom friends right now but we have our schedules in common when did shift work it was me and my family against the world lol it will get easier when they are older it so lonely ve never felt so lonely so insecure in my life keep wondering is it me ll be nicer ll be better listener ll keep any complicated opinions to myself it like this never ending cycle of being lonely feeling bad trying again and feeling more lonely exactly even the close friends from high school that have kids there their children are so much younger than mine they do like having my kids over and do have anything for their kids to do here also they ve never said they do like having my kids over can just see the stress and fear in their eyes as my kids try to play with their baby toys roughly it really hard when your spouse works hours like that mine works in the evenings and work part time morning shifts so on days where work we don see each other at all if work three days in row we won see each other for days it like even have to work at having an emotional connection with my husband which was always the relationship that came the easiest before all this yep have very difficult time with friendships especially after having kids suck at friendships as it is because hate committing to things adhd brain and tend to want to cancel once the day of said commitment comes up don think lot of people understand me either so don tend to keep friendships have really close friends that have been friends with since before having kids and we still get along really well and hang out often other than that don really have any friends part of me wants close mom friends but another doesn because don want to be social all that often haven no time for books lol this is good idea have one friend who work out with and we ve been trying new classes together so it nice she got very aloof personality which know isn about me but sometimes when you spend time with someone like that it hard not to wonder if ve done something wrong first things first don feel insecure we re all in similar situations and have busy schedules and weird friendships once you lose that anxiety start calling messaging your friends and see if they can do dinner or the park or the zoo or whatever eventually plans will stick and you ll wonder why you didn reach out sooner yes this^^ feel this and it sucks my sister lives an hour away and has ton of mom friends guess need to put myself out there more everything got more difficult after having kids just joined the peanut app only moms on there to make friends should have known there is an app for everything haha yes just joined today because need friends badly nice design like tinder for mom friends need this in my life can even seem to keep internet friends because even they understand my baby preoccupies lot of my time so slow on replying you either have to be able to drop everything to have friends it seems why can you live in pa 😢😢 literally have two friends that still talk to on weekly sometimes just once week basis ve known one since highschool not married no kids but loves mine and one who ve known since college and has one year old only difficult thing we all live in different states do have any mom friends that have kids my daughter age did have friend that was really close to few years ago but since we moved we have talked much if had that kind of mom friend again it be great we used to go over to each other houses let the kids play and talk for hours sometimes she come over and help me clean or cook and vice versa it sucks not having friends like that often my mom used to volunteer at our schools she became friends with our friends parents feel like this day and age we tend to seclude ourselves ve noticed this as my kid gets older my kid is tornado so never know if our friendships are being rejected because they don like me or if it my kid he needs to be socialized better but have anxiety after some moms at our music class were talking bad about us even asked the teacher if was just being that mom who is blind to her kid faults and she said his behavior is normal for the age and fine so then is it me ugh never used to be socially awkward before having kids my kids are rambunctious too this definitely adds to it when my son was younger he was definitely that kid the only one not following the directions me being the only parent who had to intervene to keep him in line we dropped out of so many programs because by the 2nd session he was totally out of control it is so lonely especially when other moms are sitting there enjoying the time and even socializing it no fun to hang out with someone who is preoccupied with managing their child the whole time even if it normal went through period where made goal with myself to compliment one person per day it could be the person standing in line behind me at the store while was doing it felt lot better and need to get back on it it was hard because had gotten so far into my shell but did feel more in control of my environment making it positive you could try something like that the only friends have this with are the two ve known since college miss those days too that is how you really get to know someone it the difference between living life with your friends and stopping life for your friends went to my friend house and she started opening her mail in front of me it felt so normal that real friend you re right there is some kind of disconnect my closest friends now dont have kids think if they had kids it would get too complicated and we would just grow apart yeah this is exactly the point was making above about the difference between living live with friends vs stopping life for friends how do people get to that point of living life with friends when we all have so many responsibilities and other people who constantly need our attention that does sound like it very relaxing or sustainable think this is what makes it so hard having friends is not carefree like it used to be oh my me too before marriage and kids had super active social life like everyday get to see my friends after having kids suddenly can not find the time to go out aaannnd also suddenly disliked going out with friends all the going out that wan na do is go to the groceries or malls to buy stuff that we need just wan na go out for couple of hours to buy stuff eat fast food with husband and or baby then go home no longer have the energy or desire to spend time with friends for long hours we moved cross country and that put strain on friendships but when we moved nobody was in relationships or having kids yet then after we had kids it seems like all our friends back home decided to but of course we don live near them now it sure is lonely being parent when you are from an area and work so the only times you re free are weekends but at least you can have work friends and have made friend with fellow daycare parents having bit of trouble actually talking to moms on there nobody seems to respond to me am the only one the big thing do that helps is if do finally have someone to hang out with we schedule our next meet up before leave their side it seems little awkward formal but otherwise we just do the we should hang out soon dance for months or years at time joined peanut too in my profile mention please do not reach out to me if you sell any mlm products noticed lot of mom boss work titles which kind of killed my hopes at finding new friends thankfully ve met one mom who just moved to my area and has been super down to earth and easy to talk to get it sometimes feel lonely even with lots of people around because the only thing that really counts for me as connection is long deep conversations with one person who you feel relaxed with and there just is the time or concentration for that with kids around ve been used to having to try and converse with my friends on 40 of their attention ever since people started having kids and now have one too it got even more complicated when was the childless one could at least give them my full attention and go out of my way to visit them now not so much hoping if hold onto friendships until the kids are all bit more independent it ll become easier again to have leisurely coffee where we can all have 100 of our attention available so in just like 10 more years can definitely relate to this it just as bad and possibly worse as teen mom most of my friends are going to college and living their lives partying it up and such and had to move to whole different state most moms are snobby here it just disappointing hope that as my baby gets older making friends gets bit easier particularly as she gets into sports or hobbies my ex mom actually made one of her dearest friends because their daughters cheered together so crossing my fingers for that day moving to new state has been extremely difficult but could afford to stay near family and friends it has gotten easier but some days are more difficult than others hope your search is fruitful recommend bumble bff especially if you live in well populated area seem to have made few connections that could turn worthwhile through the app and there no harm in trying completely understand ve always been reserved too which doesn make it easier still emotionally close to my two best friends from high school but they live 4+ hours we visit each other when we can apart from my sisters only have one local friend we hang out when we can but she works demanding job and has no kids—so it hard thankfully she loves kids so she doesn mind hanging with the kids around apart from that handful it just my husband the kiddos and the dog so am but keep swiping they have good discussion forums ive seen few local to me that get responses you can still go hang out am confused by this you let your server know it mocktails only for you and you get little silly and then go home early aw man grew up in utah but moved outta state if you re looking for friends you can try the peanut app it like dating app for moms whhhhaaaaaaaaaaa downloading now right seriously having mom friends is super hard way harder than back when was dating lol ugh know especially if you do tend to be on the weird side like myself also heavily tattooed yeah the discussion forums are active and just about everyone accepts my friendship requests but that as far as it goes hope your experience on it turns out better than mine did hope so there seem to be good amount of mamas in central florida so fingers crossed in north london lol that want blackout drunk for everybody or nobody we are 21 so guess understand the constant want for party really only have friends and my best friend of 11 plus years hasnt even met my month old daughter she lives about an hour away but has been back in our home town where currently live several times since she been born yeah but it also like dating app in that you ll find 99 of the people are weird or do respond
